title: 5.0.10: "internal server error" while upload after activating encryption app
body:
hi there,

after activation of the encryption app and uploading of a file the message "internal server error" occurred.

owncloud.log showed the following:
--snip--
{"app":"php","message":"require_once(): failed opening required '..\/..\/..\/lib\/base.php' (include_path='\/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib:\/var\/www\/owncloud\/config:\/var\/www\/owncloud\/3rdparty:\/var\/www\/owncloud\/apps:\/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib:.:\/usr\/share\/php:\/usr\/share\/pear:\/var\/www\/owncloud:\/var\/www\/owncloud\/apps\/search_lucene\/3rdparty') at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/apps\/files_encryption\/files\/error.php#3","level":4,"time":"2013-08-16t05:34:30+00:00"}
--snap--

a fix ist this:
--snip--
*** apps/files_encryption/files/error.php.org	2013-08-16 07:52:01.000000000 +0200
--- apps/files_encryption/files/error.php	2013-08-16 08:00:47.000000000 +0200
***************
*** 1,6 ****
  <?php
  if (!isset($_)) { //also provide standalone error page
! 	require_once '../../../lib/base.php';
  
  	$l = oc_l10n::get('files_encryption');
  
--- 1,6 ----
  <?php
  if (!isset($_)) { //also provide standalone error page
! 	require_once __dir__ . '/../../../lib/base.php';
  
  	$l = oc_l10n::get('files_encryption');

--snap--
(sorry, i couldn't figure out how to make the content of a patch file more readable  wihtin this editor.)

sytem:
os: debian 7
db: mariadb 5.5.32
webserver: apache 2.2.22-13
php: 5.4.4-14
owncloud: 5.0.10-1

cheers.
